name: Lift Off 45006 Probiotic Stain and Odor Eliminator Spray – Powerful Natural Enzyme Carpet Cleaner and Pet Odor Eliminator for Urine, Upholstery, and Hard Floors, Safe Around Kids and Pets – 16 Fl Oz
short_description: POWERFUL ENZYME CLEANER AND ODOR ELIMINATOR: Our probiotic formula acts as a natural enzyme cleaner and urine odor eliminator, breaking down tough messes like pet accidents, vomit, feces, coffee, and sweat at the source.
SAFE FOR KIDS, PETS, AND EVERYDAY USE: This non-toxic pet odor eliminator for home is water-based and child-safe. Certified by the Carpet and Rug Institute for use on all carpet types.
NO ARTIFICIAL SCENTS OR CHEMICAL AFTERSMELLS: This odor eliminator works naturally without masking smells. No fake fragrances or harsh residues, just a clean and truly scent-free home.
MULTI-SURFACE CARPET CLEANER SPRAY: Use it as a carpet stain remover, pet carpet cleaner, or sofa cleaner. Safe on hardwood floors, furniture, clothing, and car interiors with zero sticky residue.

PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA: Lift Off is formulated, manufactured, and distributed in the USA. We use superior ingredients to deliver performance and reliability you can trust. If anything doesn’t meet your expectations, contact us and we’ll make it right.
product_description: Lift Off Probiotic Stain and Odor Eliminator is a powerful enzyme cleaner that tackles tough organic messes across your home, car, and furniture. Designed to work as both a pet odor eliminator and urine odor remover, it uses live probiotic cultures that keep cleaning even after application. This natural enzyme cleaner goes deep to remove stains and smells caused by dog and cat urine, vomit, feces, milk, coffee, sweat, and more. Unlike harsh chemical sprays, Lift Off is non-toxic and water-based, making it a safe choice for families with kids and pets. Whether you need a carpet cleaner spray, sofa cleaner, or pet carpet cleaner, Lift Off delivers. It’s safe on carpets, hardwood floors, upholstery, mattresses, clothing, litter boxes, kennels, and car interiors. It leaves no sticky residue behind and won’t damage delicate surfaces when spot-tested. There are no artificial fragrances or cover-up scents. This odor eliminator neutralizes smells at the source, leaving your space fresh and truly scent-free. Lift Off is proudly made in the USA using premium ingredients. Certified safe for all carpet types by the Carpet and Rug Institute.

name: Resolve Urine Destroyer Spray – Pet Stain and Odor Remover, Carpet Cleaner Solution for Cat and Dog Urine, 32 Fl Oz
short_description: 1. DESTROYS URINE ODORS THE FIRST TIME Urine elimination technology neutralizes and removes odors on contact for immediate freshness
2. REMOVES PET STAINS AND MORE Penetrates deep to lift and remove tough pet stains like feces, vomit, dirt and their odors
3. HELPS PREVENT REMARKING Discourages pets from returning to make a mess in the same spot
4. SAFE FOR ALL SOFT SURFACE AREAS Effective of carpets, upholstery, and area rugs for versatile cleaning.
5. FROM THE #1 PET MESS CLEANING BRAND*: Trusted by pet owners for superior cleaning performance. *Based on unit sales of pet mess cleaning products ending latest 52 weeks 6/15/24
6. SUITABLE TO USE AROUND PETS: Suitable for use around cats & dogs when used as directed
product_description: Say goodbye to stubborn urine messes with Resolve Urine Destroyer Spray, a powerful cleaning solution designed to break down tough urine stains and eliminate strong, lingering odors. Formulated to penetrate deep into carpet fibers and soft surfaces, this spray targets the proteins and residues that cause persistent discoloration and unpleasant smells. Whether you’re dealing with a pet accident, a potty‑training oops, or an unexpected spill, Resolve Urine Destroyer gets to work fast—lifting stains and neutralizing odors at the source. By completely removing odor‑causing cues, it also helps prevent pets from returning to the same spot, supporting better training and a cleaner home. Safe for use around pets when applied as directed, this versatile spray is perfect for carpets, rugs, upholstery, and other soft surfaces throughout your home. With Resolve Urine Destroyer Spray, you can restore freshness, improve cleanliness, and keep your spaces feeling comfortable and odor‑free.

name: Nature's Miracle Advanced Cat Stain and Odor Eliminator Spray, Severe Mess Enzymatic Formula, 32 fl oz
short_description: FOR SEVERE CAT MESSES: Powerful enzymatic formula works to eliminate tough stains and odors from cat urine, diarrhea, vomit and other bio-based accidents.
LIGHT FRESH SCENT: Cat odor control formula gets your home smelling clean again.
ENZYMATIC FORMULA: Continues working as long as any bio-based mess is still present.
DISCOURAGES RESOILING: Removes the odor from even the toughest cat messes.
TRUSTED BRAND: From the maker of Nature’s Miracle products, the pet stain and odor removing brand you trust… because it works!
product_description: Nature’s Miracle® pet stain and odor removers have been a trusted brand for pet mess cleanup for more than 35 years. Whatever pets do, you can trust Nature’s Miracle stain and odor removers, training aids, disinfectants and litter products to undo. Accidents happen, as every cat owner knows. Nature’s Miracle Advanced Stain & Odor Eliminator for cats is an enzymatic, severe-mess stain and odor remover that actually discourages re-soiling by removing the odor of even the toughest cat messes! Bacteria-based formulas produce enzymes when they come into contact with a food source – pet urine, feces, vomit and other bio-based messes. This enzymatic cleaner continues working as long as the food source is present. Freshens with a light fresh scent. Use on carpets, hard floors, furniture, fabrics and more (see the product label for a complete list of fabrics). Do not use on untreated hardwood, leather, suede, silk or wool specialty fabrics. Always use this product at full strength. Just spray, wait 10 minutes, then blot up stain with a white cloth. When used as directed, this product is safe to use around your pets and in your home. Always use Nature’s Miracle products first. Other cleaners and detergents may fail and chemically “set” stains that will be impossible to remove.

This pet stain remover not only cleans but also acts as an anti pee spray for dogs inside by eliminating pheromones that attract pets back to soiled areas. Safe for pets and families, it’s an essential addition to your dog cleaning supplies and puppy essentials. Whether you need a carpet deodorizer, a dog pee remover, or a cat stain remover, trust OUT! for safe, affordable, and effective pet care solutions. This dog floor cleaner, couch cleaner, carpet spot cleaner, cat urine enzyme cleaner destroyer, and pet spray makes cleaning easy. Directions For Urine Stains: Turn nozzle to mist and close foaming door (A). Generously spray foam onto area. Leave for 5 minutes. Blot to remove stain. If stain persists, apply again. Allow area to dry naturally for 24 – 48 hours. Vacuum when dry. For Urine Odors: Turn nozzle to stream and open foaming door (B). Stream product onto area. Cover 2X the area of the urine spot. Blot excess. Allow area to dry naturally for 24 – 48 hours. Vacuum when dry. URINE For Feces Stains: Turn nozzle to mist and close foaming door (A). Generously spray foam onto area. Leave for 5 minutes. Blot to remove stain. If stain persists, apply again. Allow area to dry naturally for 24 – 48 hours. Vacuum when dry. For Feces Odors: Turn nozzle to stream and open foaming door (B). Stream product onto clean area. Blot excess. Allow area to dry naturally for 24 – 48 hours. Vacuum when dry. FECES For Blood/Vomit Stains: Depending on size of stain, turn nozzle to mist and close foaming door (A). Generously spray foam onto area. Leave for 10 minutes. Blot to remove stain. If stain persists, apply again. Allow area to dry naturally for 24 – 48 hours. Vacuum when dry. BLOODVOMIT For Embedded Stains: Turn nozzle to mist and close foaming door (A). Generously spray foam onto area. Blot to remove stain. Allow area to dry naturally for 24 – 48 hours. Vacuum when dry. For Stains on Top of the Carpet: Turn nozzle to mist and open foaming door (C). Mist onto stained area. Leave for 10 minutes. Wipe with clean cloth. If stain persists, apply again. Allow area to dry naturally for 24 – 48 hours. Vacuum when dry. To Control Odors: Turn nozzle to stream and open foaming door (B). Stream onto the area. Blot excess.
Model Name OUT! PetCare Advanced Stain and Odor Remover 2 Pack | Pro-Bacteria and Enzyme Formula for Tough Stains and Odor | 32 oz (Pack of 2)
Age Range Description All Life Stages
